website_summaries.verdict: Disposable pads that are very thin and absorbent.
pros: Very thin pads that prove just as absorbent as the thicker disposable pads
Sticky backing helps the pads stay in place
cons: Sometimes the glue on these pads can come off on your bra

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on the hunt for a different nursing pad so I have these a try. They are super absorbent but the sticky on the back is too strong. When I fold my nursing bras down it crumples up and then when I take it out it sticks to itself and then rips and it’s just more trouble than it’s worth. The individual plastic packaging is an ecological nightmare. No need for all that waste. I still prefer my Johnson & Johnson nursing pads. They are super hick and always show but they are still the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lansinoh
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great, they are super thin, but don’t let that make you think they won’t perform. They hold in a lot and stays thin even though it has absorbed a lot of milk. They might not seem like they are absorbing anything because they stay pretty thin, but they are. I tried these because the Lansinoh brand gets moist on top of the pad that goes against your skin and that’s not good, especially if you are trying to avoid mastitis, you don’t want moisture to encourage yeast growth. These pads definitely stay dryer and thinner than Lansinoh while holding in plenty of milk. Great pads!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: They are not visible under a bra and they are comfortable. I have not had any itchiness or sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only pads I will wear during the day. I wear thicker, less expensive ones during the night time. They are a little expensive but they are worth it to me. They are not visible under a bra and they are comfortable. I have not had any itchiness or sticking that I had with other brands. Update: 6 months into breastfeeding and I still haven't found a pad I like more than these for daytime. I wear them for work and they dont show like some of the thicker brands.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Get these pads mamas!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great price, thin, really absorbent, smooth, strong adhesive that keeps pads were you put them, and contoured like Lansinoh but so much better: the pinched creases stay pinched no matter how many times you fold them over to breastfeed!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anne Albright

customer_reviews.title: Good product, adhesive stuck to bra but other than that great
customer_reviews.text: Liked these breast pads a lot, some what skeptical because it’s not a known brand in a store but they worked really well and most of the time I couldn’t even tell I had them in. Only thing I was disappointed in & caused the 4 stars is because the adhesive would stick into my bra after wearing overnight or longer than a few hours. Other than that, great product - would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in a breast pad!
customer_reviews.text: With prior pregnancies, I had used the Lansinoh pads. When I saw these I figured I would give them a try and I'm glad I did. I love these. They are super thin so I can wear them in my tanks and they don't show, have great absorbancy, they are soft so the feel nice if your nipples are tender and I love that they actually curve around my breast. I highly recommend them and will be reordering them when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amaris Rena

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest and most discrete nursing pads out there!
customer_reviews.text: Love these nursing pads! They are discrete, comfortable and so very thin. I don’t leak a lot so they are perfect for me, though I can’t say how effective they would be for heavier let down leaks. My only caution is that they are so comfortable I’ve forgotten to change them enough and I am now wondering if I developed thrush. Beware, they are very comfy you forget you have them on!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Really the thinnest!
customer_reviews.text: These really are the thinnest pads with still some capacity to prevent leaks! I love them! Tried lots of other brands (and I’m on my third baby), but most are very obvious even sometime under a thick bra. However, these I don’t even notice under a nursing tank alone. I won’t buys any other brand from here on in.
customer_reviews.author: Margot G

customer_reviews.title: Thin and discreet
customer_reviews.text: These pads are really nice and thin. I don't find that they show through clothes unless I'm wearing something really thin and clingy. They have lasted me overnight and don't become huge like Lansinoh pads. I will definitely keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Liz K

customer_reviews.title: Best absorbency out there
customer_reviews.text: These things are CRAZY absorbent!! I overproduce and leak like crazy at night—I was going through at least 3 pairs of washable pads every night and I don’t know how many pairs during the day. One pair of these disposable pads lasts me a 4-5 hour stretch of sleep with no leakage. Bonus: you can’t really see them under clothes. The washable pads are super bulky and other disposable brands crumple up in my bra. I can’t say enough good things about these pads! The price doesnt hurt either!
customer_reviews.author: Amwenze

customer_reviews.title: My favorite milk guard!
customer_reviews.text: So thin and so comfortable! I was concerned that because they were so thin, I would have to compensate by leakage, but that has not been the case at all! I don't find them to be too expensive for their worth, but I do switch on and off with these only because often I can get double the amount for a few bucks over this price. I won't lie though, these are still my preference over any other breastfeeding pads.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: The best/ thinnest I've found
customer_reviews.text: I honestly never write reviews but these have been a lifesaver. I leak *just* enough that not wearing a nursing pad is risky, but the bigger, bulkier pads are completely unnecessary. These are thin enough that I can wear them with a sports bra but still absorbent and very functional. As previously mentioned, I don't need them to absorb a TON- so I can't speak to how they will function for those who do- but these are absolutely perfect for me and my needs!
customer_reviews.author: ASRN

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin yet ultra absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third child & just now found these! They are amazing! I’ve tried the ultra thin Nuk brand, which I found to be not very absorbent, and the super duper Lashinoh ultra absorbent pads. Those do the job but my god, so bulky! These bundlebliss pads are the best of both worlds!! Ultra thin yet super absorbent! I highly recommend these to any nursing mom. They’re the only pad you’ll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Oak2010

customer_reviews.title: Just Super!
customer_reviews.text: These pads are super thin, If you are not leaking much, especially if your milk supply is settled down already (after few weeks PP) They are soft. Adhesive is strong, so it is not rolling or falling out of bra. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Levan-i

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Thin, soft, wet durable and absorbent. I've tried others and they're not all the same. They come folded and individually wrapped making them easier to store and travel with. Also a good price
customer_reviews.author: Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 6 types of breast pads and these are by far my favorite! I am currently on my third box and still love them! They are so comfortable I forget im wearing them and they hold so much milk its awesome! They last longer than other pads and seem to hold more. I use less of them than any other I've tried and they are so comfortable. I will onlybuse these for now on!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Used to be better
customer_reviews.text: Update: These pads are very thin and absorbent. I changed my review from 5 stars to 2 though because something changed in manufacturing from my first box. The backing on the first box was breathable and the second box I received the backing was plastic which just left me with a constant damp feeling....even when changing 5 times a day. I haven’t had a chance to use these yet but they really are the thinnest pads. All other brands o have used in the past are so uncomfortable. I will update once I start using but with how frequently they should be changed for hygienic purposes I’m sure they will meet my absorbency needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: A must for nursing mommas!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome breast pads. I previously only used reusable bamboo pads but they felt damp quickly and clogged up the washer on several occasions. I can wear a pair of these for 24 hours before changing them. They are comfortable, thin, and highly absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieMae

customer_reviews.title: Great product; excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: These breast pads are the best I've purchased so far. They are very thin and do not get a lumpy look like many alternative products. I have a great deal of leaking at night, but have worn them over night with no discomfort or "damp" feeling. I'm very satisfied and will purchase again. Additionally, the seller's customer service is excellent. When I first received my product, there was an issue with the order due to the envelope in which Amazon shipped it. The seller sent a very nice email and replaced my order immediately.
customer_reviews.author: kaybee

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: You need these! I didn't realize how much I needed them before I had my daughter. I use them every day- typically one does the trick for the whole day. They are super thin, can't see them under your shirt, and when you do leak they create a jelly like pocket in the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably thin and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable and at a great value! The only slight negative I have compared to the Lansinoh is that sometimes it unsticks and folds up probably because its so thin and the adhesive is not as strong. Positive is that its so thin you can't feel it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 children, so I've used a lot of nursing pads. I think these are my favorite. They are a little pricey, but so thin and discreet. They've never leaked. I would compare them to lansinoh as far as the adhesive, absorbancy, and the softness level, but they're much thinner.
customer_reviews.author: LSA

customer_reviews.title: Light, thin, dry
customer_reviews.text: This one the best pads I used! They are super light and thin, but with awesome absorption!!! When I first breatfeeding, my skins became super sensitive. I tried all the brands you can find in store and I was still very uncomfortable. I had to change the pads every 2-3 hours. Now with this one, I only need to change every 6-8 hours. The only downside is you have to wear a padded bra. Otherwise your nipple will show.
customer_reviews.author: Shu

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent & Comfortable Nursing Pads!
customer_reviews.text: Great nursing pads. Very thin, but ultra absorbent pads. They are more comfortable and less bulky than any other pads I have used and they keep the moisture off your skin unlike reusable fabric pads. I'd recommend them if you're breastfeeding, these are great when I go to work or out in public in general and don't want to have a bulky pad on!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable, most absorbent, and least noticeable nursing pad I have found. I tried some cheaper options and found I had to change the pad every 3-4 hours because they would get bulky and I’d feel wet all the time. These are infinitely better. A pad lasts all day and you can barely see them under your clothes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert HUghes

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a bit more cushion inside for nipple comfort. But I think it’s a great product and thickness it is helps with creating space for nipple to nest inside instead of being smashed
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my fourth box of these as they are the thinnest/best I’ve used. For whatever reason, these weren’t as sticky and would get folded down inside my bra. I sent a message to the seller, and they sent me another box as a replacement. I really appreciate it and will continue to purchase these as long as I’m nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: My favorite nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nursing pads. Awesome if you are not a big leaker because they are much less bulky than the lansinoh brand I was using at first. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pieceofmine

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These stick better than expensive brand name ones that I have used. They are round and conform perfectly to the breast. They are very absorbent and i have had no issues with any leaking. You don't even notice that you are wearing them because they are so comfortable and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best nursing pads EVER
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AMAZING. You can’t even see them through your shirts. So thin and soft. I was able to wear them stuck inside a dress and go braless.
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: Didnt hold up for me :(
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as good as I hoped. They leaked and the sticky parts that are supposed to hold them in place didnt hold. They constantly bunched up. Only good thibg about these are the amount that comes in the box and how thin they are.
customer_reviews.author: Tygen reeder

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Really like these pads!! I have tried many different brands and these truly are the thinnest. They hold a lot of liquid and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! They look like they may not absorb a lot but they do! Also incredibly comfortable! Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Discreet and soft
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far! Haven’t leaked a ton in them yet so can’t speak to their absorbency yet. They are soft though and super discreet. Just wearing a nursing cami and you can’t tell I have these in the shelf bra. Love that!
customer_reviews.author: LNJ

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I used several different types before finding these. They are thin and less visible through shirts / dress / what have you. They hold up nicely and seem to be pretty absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs so well you should change pad nightly even if you think it’s dry
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best and thinnest pads I have used and I have four children. Please beware though...they absorb so well that you may think the pad is clean and can be reworn. I ended up with a terrible case of mastitis because of that. Obviously not the products fault but just be sure not to reuse!
customer_reviews.author: ldn

customer_reviews.title: I like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot. They do sometimes bunch up in my bra, but I have yet to find a brand that does not. These are thin and comfortable yet also absorbant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, thin and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these pads! They are easy to use and stay in place really well. Only downside is sometimes they stick to themselves when you pull ur bra down to nurse; then they are folded uncomfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hall

customer_reviews.title: A perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: These work incredibly well and I would highly recommend them to any breastfeeding Mama. I tried reusable/washable pads at first but they just didn’t absorb or stay in place. These pads kept me dry and comfortable for 24 hours. Such a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KLee1421

customer_reviews.title: Better than the big name brands
customer_reviews.text: These are the best breast pads I have tried. I have used all the too rated but these where the softest and didnt leave your booboes itchy like the other big name ones do. Must try for breastfeeding mommies!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great value
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they stay in place, are absorbent, and don’t itch or feel weird while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey G

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not absorbent enough
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but I do find that I have to replace them frequently. Maybe these will be better later on when I go back to work. But for now with a newborn I need more absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: K.N.

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest and most absorbent on the market
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVES these pads! They are just incredible. 100% accurate that these are the thinnest and most absorbent pad on the market. They have never leaked through and they absorb without getting bloated or soggy. Head and shoulders above all other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: These really are thin and work great
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the big bulky pads. These really are thin, but super absorbent and have worked really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Koronides

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Since they are a bit more expensive then ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Since they are a bit more expensive then other brands I alternate depending on what I’m wearing. They are the thinnest breast pads I’ve ever had which is nice when your not wearing a thickly lined bra.
customer_reviews.author: Camren N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pads if you don’t leak a lot
customer_reviews.text: I tried other breast pads and they were bulky and uncomfortable and didn’t stay in place. These are ultra thin and contoured and fit inside my nursing bras really nicely. I don’t even use the adhesive and they stay in place until I unclip my bra. Definitely recommend these pads if you don’t leak very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like these pads but the only complaint I have is that sometimes the edges will rub against my breast and make it feel irritating. Otherwise, it absorbs nicely, it's thin and stays in place well.
customer_reviews.author: CFHLV

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: These nursing pads are incredibly thin and absorbent. After trying at least 4 different brands, these are by far my favorite and I continue to buy them again and again. I would recommend them to all nursing mothers
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, super absorbent, not the best adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Their not super bulky and I usually forget that I even have them in. The absorbency is awesome - I always end up leaking at night and always wake up with my clothes and sheets dry. Their super soft and don’t agitate my breast or rub them the wrong way. My ONLY slight complaint is that adhesion wise their a little lacking. Unless your wearing a bra or something that fits a bit tighter around your chest these tend to wonder off especially when lying down. Other then that - great product and I will order again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Harriett adamson

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, absorbent and they stay in place. Exactly what I need from a pad!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Days

customer_reviews.title: Ive tried a lot of breast pads!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love how thin these are! At first, I didn't believe something so thin could hold much without leaking. But these proved me wrong! I have tried many breast pads and these are my favorite. I also love how you can't see them through your clothes! Glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Mold?
customer_reviews.text: My box came very dirty, looks like mold. It was also on the inside of the sealed box. I can not use them now because I can’t risk my baby’s health.
customer_reviews.author: Niece party of 5

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing - they feel/look like you are wearing nothing but can absorb a LOT of liquid. Other breastfeeding pads look and feel like maxi pads - these are paper thin and only get thicker if they are saturated with liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Pads are what i was looking for but only 59 in the box
customer_reviews.text: Thin pad that does a great job of absorbing liquid. Comfortable to wear. I've already purchased another box! Update: the second box only has 59 pads which is a problem since I have an even number of breasts. I reached out to the company and their solution was to have me buy another box :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Best Out There
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Much better than too competitors. They are thin, comfortable, absorbent, and stay put. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: navi

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest pads around!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I’ve switched from using medela and the lansinoh ones. Much thinner, better shape, and gentle on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only box I needed
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Plenty in the box to last a long time. I just wish they weren't all individually wrapped because it was a lot of wrappers, but they were nice and thin and did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Cait Loertscher

customer_reviews.title: Could not feel it but does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used to use those big brands in nursery product. One day I tried this one, and cannot switch back to those. These pads are super thin that you might not be able to feel them existing. But they do the absorbing job perfectly. I will purchase another box soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ying Liu

customer_reviews.title: Really thin!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these pads are thin which is really nice. I don't leak much so these are great to stash in my bra because I want a little something in there just in case I leak.
customer_reviews.author: M. Simco

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple different pads but this one is by far my favorite, wish I didn't waste my money on the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bit pricey, but truly no show pads
customer_reviews.text: These are the first nursing pads I've bought that truly don't show. I wear reusable pads at home since these are a bit pricey, but these are good for whenever I have to leave the house and be seen by people.
customer_reviews.author: T Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: Overall great nursing pad. Very think and absorbent (lasts all day). Only complaint is it’s not the softest around the edges so if you breasts are sore it can irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Love! Very thin and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're very thin and don't show at all while wearing a nursing bra. Very comfortable, no leaking stains, and also very comfortable. Only negative is that adhesion wise they're average. It stays on fine when you're wearing a bra, but I've found they will just fall off if you dangle your bra when changing etc. Also wish I could buy these in a bigger QTY than the 60 count box just because I go thru them so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: More absorption than I would have thought looking at them!
customer_reviews.author: JHH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE!! So happy I found these. These are the ONLY pads I can wear under clothes without them showing giant circles. I will only use these now
customer_reviews.author: jaimelynne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I’m not breastfeeding, but these have been wonderful in the time that I’m waiting for my milk to suppress. They come in individually wrapped packages and are super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pads. Super thin and super absorbent. Just wish they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: and this one is definitely is the best! It is really thin and holds a large ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried three different brands of nursing pads, and this one is definitely is the best! It is really thin and holds a large amount of milk which helps me a lot in the night time! Will buy it again~highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baul

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Best pads I’ve purchased. I’m an over supplier and was worried about leaking. These held up and are unnoticeable under clothes. Comfortable too. Purchased many times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super thin and highly absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: The pads are really thin and surprisingly hold a lot! I was a little skeptical at first, but they have been great so far... no leaks/overflow. Highly recommend! A bit on the pricey side compared to other brands (double the cost per pad compared to other similar products).
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Super thin, much thinner than others on the market with the same absorbency. Very comfortable and easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Thinnest
customer_reviews.text: When they say thinnest ever...it sure is. Super thin. Not for night time use. But there is nothing wrong with them at all. They are great thin pads
customer_reviews.author: Janelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I love how this the pad is. It is also super absorbent. I have never had any issue with leaking while using these pads. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa Perkins

customer_reviews.title: ... I ran out of the Lansinoh pads and I like these much better
customer_reviews.text: I bought these nursing pads once I ran out of the Lansinoh pads and I like these much better! Not only are they thinner but they hold just as much as the thicker Lansinoh pads. I have purchased these pads twice and will continue to buy these ones until I don’t need them anymore!
customer_reviews.author: First_Time_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky
customer_reviews.text: Super thin, but super sticky backing. The glue comes off in my bras- so I have to pick it out carefully like sticky tack. Luckily it doesn’t leave residue if you have time to carefully remove.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moon

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent! I’m a very heavy leaker and my reusable pads and the Lansinoh disposables wouldn’t last me through the night. These definitely do! I use my reusable pads during the day and one set of these at night. No more waking up with wet clothes and sheets 👍🏻😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these breast pads. Super THIN!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these breast pads overnight, to work, out...everywhere and anytime I needed a breast pad. They are AWESOME! Super thin yet absorbed everything. Even overnight I never had one leak. A friend even gave me her leftover Lansinohs and I still ordered these b/c the Lansinohs feel like diapers in my bra. I forget I even have the bundlebliss pads in. Can’t say enough great things about them. Wish I had them fir my other two kids.
customer_reviews.author: JJaspert

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, but it could sell Lee’s money. I cannot afford to buy one every month.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola Valéry

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Thinnest pads I've ever seen and still so absorbent! Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: WarnerJ6

customer_reviews.title: Thin yet absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These pads are awesome they fit well, are extremely absorbent and but make boobs look bulky or odd shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin
customer_reviews.text: Ultra thin however it absorbs well and does the job
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pad
customer_reviews.text: These pads are awesome! Hold lots of milk while still keeping you dry. This is my fourth baby and I wish I would have had these from the start.
customer_reviews.author: UnmuzzledMen.com

customer_reviews.title: Good, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: As nice and thin as these are I'm just not a fan of nursing pads. Probably a great product for someone who really needs the protection or doesn't mind the feeling of one against the nipple... I find nursing pads a hassle in any bra when it comes time to nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like they’re not on but work so well!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dryness and comfort! I’m shocked how well these work considering how thin they are
customer_reviews.author: EmilyF

customer_reviews.title: Thin and very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They are super thin and very absorbent. I tried these then the Madela brand. The madela are super thick and bulky so I’m going back to these.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi1021

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are thin but totally work great. The adhesive is also great. Better than other ones I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Hanieh Azar

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable breast pads I’ve ever used! I’ve nursed three babies and I’m sad it took me until the third to find these pads. I will never use a different kind again. Although I do wish they were made organic.
customer_reviews.author: Maia Jones

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: They’re super thin yet still hold a lot of milk without showing. They’re also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Wilber

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I tried several brands and these were my favorite. This is my second child & I only used Medela pads with my first, but I liked these better. They are thinner but just as absorbent. Stayed in place well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RJSMYLOVE

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will keep buying throughout breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: Great product, will keep buying throughout breastfeeding! I like how thin they are, doesn’t feel like a maxi pad in my bra!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ultra thin .. amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever! So thin.. it’s my 3rd box!
customer_reviews.author: cocoa butter

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I tried a lot of different brands and these were by far my favorite! So thin, absorb just as well as thicker ones and don’t show through clothes if you have a think bra/top on. Hard to go back to using other brands once you use these, they are so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect absorption!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say AMAZING design and technology to make these! They absorb even the heaviest of let downs! They are very comfy and don’t itch like other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even notice I am wearing the breast pads—they are comfortable, thin and absorb a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My new go to breast pad
customer_reviews.text: I knowingly spend more money to purchase these pads. They are by far THE thinnest. I can wear them with tanks and tees and no visible circles around the chest. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KPecard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pads! Truly the thinnest ones there are. I’ve tried several brands and these ones are by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: The Selimshayevs

customer_reviews.title: & breastfeeding journey have tried lots of others & these are my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: These truly are the thinnest nursing pads ever! And they work phenomenally. I’m on my third babe, & breastfeeding journey have tried lots of others & these are my favorite so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter, she has been very happy with level of absorbency as well as the comfort. Will be a return customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, never leaked through and you can’t even tell they’re there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and discreet!
customer_reviews.text: These are so thin and discreet, easily worn with any bra or nursing tank. Great absorbency. I personally don’t use the sticker part to adhere to bra/tank, I remove during nursing but I’m sure that part is equally awesome. I wish I had known about these after having/nursing my other babies. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H

product_meta.title: Thinnest Pads Ever. Bundlebliss Disposable Ultra Thin Nursing Breast Pads. 60 Highly Absorbent Breastfeeding Milk Pads.
feature_bullets: Thinnest Pad In The Market, Bundlebliss Ultra Thin Disposable Lactation Nursing Bra Pads Is Only 1mm Thin. You Would Not Know It’s There.
With The New Improved Polymer From Japan, It Can Absorb More Than 120ml Of Leaks. For Day And Night Use.
Honeycomb Quilted Pads Wicks The Moisture Instantaneously Away From The Skin Keeping All Mummies Dry And Comfortable All Day. Effective Milk Catchers
Using Fluff Pulp From The United States, Bundlebliss Is Ultra Soft And Silky Smooth. Perfect For The Sensitive Ones
Produced By A FDA Registered Manufacturer.
